name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
else
camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
motion missile: user
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
end
wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>
<follow action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
reset zoom
jump user: 200%, 30
move user: return, 30
wait for movement
else
reset zoom
end
</follow action>

name: Guard

name: Heal
note:
<whole action>
camera focus: user
zoom: 250%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20
wait for movement

face user: forward
wait: 10

wait for animation
action effect
</whole action>

name: LandDestroyer
note:
<setup action>
display action
camera focus: user
zoom: 150%
perform start
wait: 60
float user: 495%, 20
opacity user: 0%, 20
wait for float
</setup action>
<whole action>
reset zoom: 30
move user: targets, center, 20
wait: 60
motion attack: user
opacity user: 100%, 1
float user: 0, 20
wait: 10
action animation: target
action effect
wait for animation
</whole action>
<follow action>
reset zoom
jump user: 200%, 30
move user: return, 30
wait for movement
</follow action>
